# The ctype extension

This extension provides support for character type checking according to the
locale.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_CTYPE

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_CTYPE_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.
